title: A most excellent and perfecte homish apothecarye or homely physik booke, for all the grefes and diseases of the bodye. Translated out the Almaine speche into English by Ihon Hollybush
author: Brunschwig, Hieronymus, ca. 1450-ca. 1512.
publicationDate: in the yeare of our Lord M.D.LXI. [1561]
